title: InstrumentAttributeCommon
description: Attributes and classification of a financial instrument

market.description: Represents the second level of market classification in the post-trading process
market.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalMarketCode

segment.description: Segment represents the first level of market classification in the post-trading process
segment.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalSegmentCode

tickerSymbol.description: Letters that identify the instrument traded on stock exchange

securityCategory.description: The security category represents the third level of market classification in the post-trading process
securityCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalSecurityCategoryCode

isin.description: International Securities Identification Number - Standardized international code for unique identification of financial instruments

cfiCode.description: Classification of Financial Instruments code - ISO 10962 standard

currency.description: Currency code in which the amount is denominated
currency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

expirationDate.description: Date when the instrument expires or matures

expirationCode.description: Expiration code associated with the instrument

allocationRoundLot.description: Pre-defined lot size for allocation purposes

tradingStartDate.description: Date when trading of the financial instrument begins

tradingEndDate.description: Date when trading of the financial instrument ends
